What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for with enough money one could emigrate to Orbitals above where there seems to be plenty of dishnow meat for those that 'take' without paying. Some survivors group together. Together they are called affected, visible is just not the right word

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little coherence or logic throughout, but I reject that type and asked you to watch it without any negative presceptions. Despite its title “Honor Among Thieves”, the movie doesn't actually include much honor among the thieves at all
